name: Student Registration Management System
desc: Web platform for students to register for courses, track attendance, and pay fees. Admins manage records and logs.

name: College Event Management System
desc: Web system for managing college events with scheduling, registration, and auto-certificate generation.

name: E-Commerce Plant Nursery
desc: E-commerce platform for plant sales. Features catalog, cart, payment, order tracking, and delivery management.

name: SPACS Website
desc: Website for Students Programming Association of Computer Science to manage members, meetings, and event communication.

name: Biometric Ballot System
desc: Secure voting system using fingerprint verification and OTP via MXFACE API. Prevents fraud and ensures transparency.
